          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">An electromagnet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Elektromagnet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un électro-aimant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um eletroímã</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un elettromagnete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας ηλεκτρομαγνήτης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un electroimán</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an electromagnet made of iron core and coil of wire. The electromagnet attracts the steel ball as the power supply is switched on.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Coil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">power supply</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steel ball</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Elektromagneten, das 
vom Eisenkern und von der Spule der Leitung gebildet wird. Das 
Elektromagnet zieht die Stahlkugel an, während das 
Spg.Versorgungsteil eingeschaltet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un électro-aimant fait
en noyau de fer et enroulement de fil. L'électro-aimant attire 
la boule en acier pendant que l'alimentation d'énergie est 
alimentée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um eletroímã feito do 
núcleo de ferro e da bobina do fio. O eletroímã atrai a 
esfera de aço enquanto a fonte de alimentação é ligada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un elettromagnete 
fatto del nucleo di ferro e della bobina di legare. 
L'elettromagnete attrae la sfera d'acciaio mentre il gruppo di 
alimentazione è inserito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει έναν ηλεκτρομαγνήτη 
φιαγμένο από πυρήνα σιδήρου και πηνίο του καλωδίου. Ο 
ηλεκτρομαγνήτης προσελκύει τη σφαίρα χάλυβα δεδομένου ότι η 
παροχή ηλεκτρικού ρεύματος είναι αναμμένη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un electroimán hecho de
base de hierro y de la bobina del alambre. El electroimán atrae
la bola de acero mientras que se enciende (con.) la fuente de 
alimentación.</string>
          </description>
